    • Uses of WindupConfigurationOption in org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration.options

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InputPathOption
      Specifies the Input path for Windup.
      class  OfflineModeOption
      Indicates that all opterations should function in "Offline" mode (without accessing the internet).
      class  OutputPathOption
      Indicates that output path for the windup report and other data produced by a Windup execution.
      class  UserRulesDirectoryOption
      Indicates the directory that will contain rules provided by the user.
